alert.note: Alert for Bristol Bay (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 21 at 4:24PM AKST until November 23 at 1:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON WEDNESDAY TO 1 AM AKST THURSDAY FROM DILLINGHAM AND NORTH... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Bristol Bay, from Dillingham north. * WHEN...From noon Wednesday to 1 AM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and surfaces. Gusty winds in combination with falling snow could lead to minor reductions in visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Bristol Bay could see a brief period of freezing rain as snow transitions to rain on Wednesday. Most areas should see a quick transition and little ice accumulation, though areas north of Dillingham (including Aleknagik) could see higher ice accumulations as surface temperatures take longer to warm above freezing.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
